name: IMD 2006 Winter - Forage Frenzy - Rumpus Room
name_original: IMD 2006 Winter - Forage Frenzy - Rumpus Room
description:
Get ready for a Forage Frenzy! Play as a fox who just wants something yummy to eat. Run, jump, and hide from guards as you try to collect as much food as possible. Unlock more of the store as you play, and become the Legendary Golden Fox if you collect enough points! Have fun, and be sneaky!

Download for a better gaming experience. There are known bugs with the browser version.

(IT IS HIGHLY RECOMENDED THAT YOU DOWNLOAD THE GAME)

Design Objective:

Rumpus Room created Forest Frenzy for the Final Project of Introduction to Computer Games, IMD2006 at Carleton University.

The game is a single-player arcade experience designed for mischievousness, exploration, and suspense.

Rumpus Room: Christopher Hearty, Dylan Way, Patrick Stevens, Avery Smith
